TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordDeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 使用 PBKDF1 算法的扩展从密码派生密钥。

span.span: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使用 PKCS # 5 v2.0 标准版中定义的 PBKDF1 算法的扩展从密码派生适合用作密钥材料的字节。This class uses an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm defined in the PKCS#5 v2.0 standard to derive bytes suitable for use as key material from a password. IETF RRC 2898 中记录了标准。The standard is documented in IETF RRC 2898. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 工具、十六进制编辑器，或者只是在文本编辑器中打开程序集（如 notepad.exe），可以从程序集中检索硬编码的密码。Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类从密码创建密钥 。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 通过使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler)、十六进制编辑器，或者只是在文本编辑器中打开程序集（如 Notepad.exe），可以从程序集中检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类从密码创建密钥 。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. summary.span: 从 对象导出加密密钥。

span.span: Derives a cryptographic key from the object.
The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函数是加密 API 函数 CryptDeriveKey 的包装器 ( # A1，旨在提供使用加密 API 与应用程序的互操作性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果 `keySize` 将参数设置为0位，则使用指定算法的默认密钥大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used. ## Examples 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#2)]

-or-

-or-

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 `Finalize` 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize``Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时 ，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

[<System.Obsolete("Rfc2898DeriveBytes replaces PasswordDeriveBytes for deriving key material from a password and is preferred in new applications.")>]

param.span: 要生成的伪随机密钥字节数。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.
Returns pseudo-random key bytes.

returns.span: 由伪随机密钥字节组成的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以创建任意数量的伪随机字节。This method can create any number of pseudo-random bytes. 但是，字节序列的强度受到哈希输出中字节数的限制。However, the strength of the byte sequence is limited by the number of bytes in the hash output.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典攻击是一种攻击，攻击者通过将加密的值与以前计算的加密值（最可能的密钥）进行比较来尝试解密加密的消息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 在密钥派生之前，在密码末尾引入随机字节，这种攻击的难度更大。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of random bytes at the end of the password before the key derivation. 这些随机字节称为 salt。These random bytes are known as salt.

exception.span: 密钥 salt 值是固定的，尝试更改该值。

span.span: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
Cryptographic Services
